channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Awesome Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Awesome Support

item.title: CVE-2023-5354|2024-08-02T07:59:44.367Z -- unknown -- awesome%20support
item.description: The Awesome Support WordPress plugin before 6.1.5 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin.

item.title: CVE-2023-5352|2024-08-02T07:59:43.194Z -- unknown -- awesome%20support
item.description: The Awesome Support WordPress plugin before 6.1.5 does not correctly authorize the wpas_edit_reply function, allowing users to edit posts for which they do not have permission.

item.title: CVE-2023-5355|2024-08-02T07:59:44.350Z -- unknown -- awesome%20support
item.description: The Awesome Support WordPress plugin before 6.1.5 does not sanitize file paths when deleting temporary attachment files, allowing a ticket submitter to delete arbitrary files on the server.
